title: Do you qualify for tax credits - quick questionnaire

details.description: Check if you qualify for tax credits using an online questionnaire
details.more_information:
It takes about 5 mins to complete. You’ll need your income details for the tax years 2011 to 2012 and 2012 to 2013.

Use the more detailed tax credits calculator instead if:

  • you get the highest rate Care Component of Disability Living Allowance
  • you get the higher rate of Attendance Allowance
  • your partner has a disability

You need to make a claim to find out for definite if you qualify and how much youâ€™ll get.
details.introduction: Use this quick online questionnaire to find out if you’re likely to qualify for tax credits.
details.will_continue_on: on the HM Revenue & Customs website
